ygData.subject: Kisch Der Pavz
ygData.msgSnippet: To address the speculation on the Paw weapon: Yes, it can be wielded in either hand.  I currently am testing it in place of my second ykesha... proc rate seems
ygData.messageBody:
To address the speculation on the Paw weapon:

Yes, it can be wielded in either hand. I currently am testing it in place
of my second ykesha... proc rate seems about the same as ykesha, but the
poison is pretty slow. I like the +5 dex, and the weight in my offhand
isn't appreciably draining my stamina except in really really long fights.
The delay is a bit much, so I think soon I'll go back to my dual ykesha.
The graphic is rather plain - looks like the Crystalline Blade (more of a
longish short sword than a long sword).
